description:
High-res 7″ display screen with white backlight, easy to read
Automatic calibration, ATC measurement, parameter setup
Automatic reading stable indication, calibration indication
Data storage: 450 readings
Data export: Flash disk/ Wireless printer (the printer is optional)
Equipped with a flexible probe holder and pH buffer solutions for convenient use
Protection class: IP54
